statements: UPDATE user_authentication_logs SET login_status = FALSE WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE user_authentication_logs SET login_time = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE username = 'john_doe'
UPDATE user_authentication_logs SET login_status = TRUE WHERE user_id = 1
UPDATE user_authentication_logs SET username = 'john_doe', login_status = FALSE WHERE user_id = 2
UPDATE authentication_attempts SET authentication_result = TRUE WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE biometric_failure_logs SET failure_reason = 'Incorrect fingerprint' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE authentication_attempts SET authentication_result = true WHERE user_id = 123 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
UPDATE biometric_failure_logs SET failure_reason = 'Fingerprint sensor malfunction' WHERE user_id = 456 AND timestamp < '2021-12-31 23:59:59'
UPDATE authentication_attempts SET success = FALSE WHERE id = 100
UPDATE biometric_verification SET verified = TRUE WHERE username = 'john_doe'
UPDATE authentication_attempts SET success = true WHERE user_id = 100 AND timestamp > '2021-01-01';
UPDATE failure_logs SET error_message = 'Invalid credentials' WHERE user_id = 200;
UPDATE authentication_attempts SET success = true WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 100;

UPDATE user_profiles SET email = 'newemail@example.com', username = 'newusername' WHERE user_id = 456;

UPDATE user_authentication_attempts SET authentication_result = true, timestamp = '2022-01-01 07:00:00' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_authentication_attempts SET authentication_result = TRUE WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_accounts SET username = 'john_doe' WHERE user_id = 456 AND password_hash = 'hashed_password';
